ack.p: We gratefully acknowledge the expert group of public health practitioners who gathered in Tallinn, Estonia in October 2016 for the Measurement and Surveillance of HIV Epidemics (MeSH) Consortium Scientific Symposium on Data Driven Decision Making to Control the HIV Epidemic. The key points, solutions, and recommendations presented in this paper reflect the authorâ€™s consideration of the discussions held at the Tallinn symposium. This work is funded by the MeSH Consortium.
